Arithmetic Operations¶

This section cover the four basic arithmetic operations. When you click on it the operation will be done if possible.

Demo

A demo of the basic arithmetic operation is available.

When old expression are saved will be possible to undo the action.

Demo

A demo of the undo feature is available.
